characteristics.name: Sliding Slinger
characteristics.description: When you target an enemy from effective range you can move 1 rangeband before or after the attack.

characteristics.name: Static
characteristics.description: Enemies hit by this become pylons of power lashing out to all static targets. Attacks against Static targets ignore cover and deal half damage to all other targets who are afflicted with Static. Static lasts until the enemy is defeated.

characteristics.name: Phase Shift
characteristics.description: Teleport up to Far before or after the attack.

passives.name: Mirrorâ€™s Edge
passives.description: Whenever you successfully Disengage, gain Stealth.

passives.name: Ghostwalker
passives.description: When targeted by an enemy Engaged with you, roll a 1d6, on a 5+ the attack automatically misses, check before the attack.

passives.name: Agile
passives.description: Can attack twice during your turn.
